content: The Act may be cited as the "Puerto Rico Economic Activity Credit Improvement Act of 1997" and involves amendments to the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, specifically focusing on modifications of the Puerto Rico Economic Activity Credit. The "Puerto Rico Economic Activity Credit Improvement Act of 1997" amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, specifically focusing on modifications of the Puerto Rico Economic Activity Credit. The Act defines qualified domestic corporations eligible to claim credit based on actively conducting business in Puerto Rico.
